plugins.name: corvran
plugins.description: The Adventure Engine of Corvran - An RPG game master system that enables Claude Code to run tabletop-style adventures with persistent world state, character management, and narrative gameplay.

plugins.name: daggerheart-system
plugins.description: Daggerheart RPG mechanics for Adventure Engine adventures. Provides character creation with constrained Experiences, Hope/Fear token economy, spotlight-based combat, domain cards, adversary management, and SRD rule lookups. Uses Duality Dice (2d12) for narrative tension between player success and GM opportunity.

plugins.name: d20-system
plugins.description: SRD 5.2-compatible d20 RPG mechanics for Adventure Engine adventures. Provides skills for character creation, combat, spellcasting, monster creation, and authoritative rule lookups from the complete System Reference Document 5.2.1.
